title: A Revolution’s Revolution
description: It was human vs. food and then food vs. food. What will remain in the aftermath of a revolution?
quote: If we’re not eaten, are we not food?
altHero: black and white: a bagel smoking a cigarette and wearing a war helmet that says “bread to kill” with a peace sign
alt1: bagel leads a group of food into a cafe, they are wearing makeshift war gear and holding weapons
alt2: bagel looks upon a freezer with sausages hanging from the ceiling
alt3: bagel looks upon a pile of food in a wasteland, a juicebox is red against the black and white scene
alt4: bagel cries next to a dead lavash
